description:
11.129 hue
Modify the hue and/or the saturation of the input.

It accepts the following parameters:


h and H are mutually exclusive, and can’t be
specified at the same time.

The b, h, H and s option values are
expressions containing the following constants:
name: hue

options.description: Specify the hue angle as a number of degrees. It accepts an expression, and defaults to "0".
options.name: h

options.description: Specify the saturation in the [-10,10] range. It accepts an expression and defaults to "1".
options.name: s

options.description: Specify the hue angle as a number of radians. It accepts an expression, and defaults to "0".
options.name: H

options.description: Specify the brightness in the [-10,10] range. It accepts an expression and defaults to "0".
options.name: b
